name: Sound Sampler for Beatbox, Dubstep and Soundboard
name_original: Sound Sampler for Beatbox, Dubstep and Soundboard
description:
What a great app there is so much to do with it.

*Record your own dub pad
*Record your own Beatbox machine
*Make your own soundboard
*make a fart app
*Endless possibilities

In record mode hold the button then talk or play sound then release button. Thats it its that easy!
